story_arceus_08_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I heard the next Arceus Cup is gonna be
a tournament based on the PWT!
story_arceus_08_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I guess you participated in the PWT back
in Unova, Rosa?
story_arceus_08_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Seems you have to be a Gym Leader to
participate. Are you two gonna give it a go?
story_arceus_08_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
That said, I’ve heard if there are more than
eight applicants, they’ll pick us at random.
story_arceus_08_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: Oh, look at that! I got in!
story_arceus_08_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
OK, time for Arceus to recognize my bond
with my partner Pokémon!
story_arceus_08_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Let’s both do our best and put up a
good fight!
story_arceus_08_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: Good luck, you two! I know you’ll do great!
